list.name: Changes
list.comment: Core Infrastructure: ◦ Created setup.py to handle dependency checks, tool downloads (from ACRD-toolset.md), and DB initialization. ◦ Moved and refined db_manager.py to modules/ with full schema implementation (device profiles, tools, logs). ◦ Added requirements.txt, .gitignore, and LICENSE. • Modules & Logic: ◦ Implemented device_quarry.py for ADB/Fastboot device detection. ◦ Implemented ai_integration.py for Gemini API interaction with error handling. ◦ Implemented download.py with checksum verification. ◦ Implemented root.py for fetching warnings and methods. ◦ Added HAL wrappers: adb_wrapper.py, fastboot_wrapper.py. ◦ Added functional stubs for compile, decompile, diagnostic, debug, and repair modules. • UI: ◦ Built a dynamic TUI in ui/tui.py using rich, connecting all modules via a main menu. • Testing & Maintenance: ◦ Added unit tests (test_db, test_hal, test_ai) and integration tests (test_core_flow, test_safety). ◦ Added scripts/prune_logs.py for database maintenance. ◦ Added verify_urls.py to validate tool download links. • Documentation: ◦ Added documentation/EXTENSIBILITY.md. ◦ Updated TODO.md to reflect project completion status.

task.summary: Core Infrastructure: ◦ Created setup.py to handle dependency checks, tool downloads (from ACRD-toolset.md), and DB initialization. ◦ Moved and refined db_manager.py to modules/ with full schema implementation (device profiles, tools, logs). ◦ Added requirements.txt, .gitignore, and LICENSE. • Modules & Logic: ◦ Implemented device_quarry.py for ADB/Fastboot device detection. ◦ Implemented ai_integration.py for Gemini API interaction with error handling. ◦ Implemented download.py with checksum verification. ◦ Implemented root.py for fetching warnings and methods. ◦ Added HAL wrappers: adb_wrapper.py, fastboot_wrapper.py. ◦ Added functional stubs for compile, decompile, diagnostic, debug, and repair modules. • UI: ◦ Built a dynamic TUI in ui/tui.py using rich, connecting all modules via a main menu. • Testing & Maintenance: ◦ Added unit tests (test_db, test_hal, test_ai) and integration tests (test_core_flow, test_safety). ◦ Added scripts/prune_logs.py for database maintenance. ◦ Added verify_urls.py to validate tool download links. • Documentation: ◦ Added documentation/EXTENSIBILITY.md. ◦ Updated TODO.md to reflect project completion status.
